BiNGO
Class ParameterFactory

java.lang.Object
  BiNGO.ParameterFactory

public class ParameterFactory
extends Object

Convenience class which contains preset BiNGO parameters settings for common scenarios used.

Author:
Pablo Moreno

ParameterFactory

Method Detail

makeParametersForChEBIBinomialOverRep

public static BingoParameters makeParametersForChEBIBinomialOverRep(String ontologyFile)
Provides parameters settings for the ChEBI Binomial over representation enrichment analysis.

Parameters:
ontologyFile - the path to the obo ontology file to be used.
Returns:
the BingoParameters objects containing parameters for this type of analysis.

makeParametersForWeightedAnalysis

public static BingoParameters makeParametersForWeightedAnalysis(String ontologyFile)
Provides parameters settings for the ChEBI weighted enrichment analysis. This type of analysis uses the SaddleSum algorithm to include the weights into the enrichment calculation.

Parameters:
ontologyFile - the path to the obo ontology file to be used.
Returns:
the BingoParameters objects containing parameters for this type of analysis.
